body.name: Paula's Choice-DEFENSE Essential Glow Moisturizer with SPF 30, Vitamin C & E, Niacinamide, Argan Oil & Resveratrol, Anti-Pollution, 0.5 Oz
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 10 hrs 8 mins
features: RADIANCE-BOOSTING MOISTURIZER WITH SPF: This daytime anti-aging moisturizer combines mineral-based, UVA/UVB broad-spectrum sun protection with brightening vitamin C, potent antioxidants, and skin-soothing plant extracts to create an instant, healthy, hydrated glow for makeup-optional skin.

Paula's Choice DEFENSE collection was created to address the specific needs of skin is exposed to environmental stressors such as smog, small particulate matter, car exhaust, cigarette smoke, and blue light from digital devices.

Help defend skin against the effects of environmental damage and pollution with this nourishing, glow-enhancing moisturizer with broad-spectrum SPF 30. Apply liberally as the final step in your morning skin care routine.

Paula's Choice products are made with YOUR SKIN in mind. Whatever your skincare concern, whether dryness, acne, fine lines, or sensitive skin; we've got a treatment line for you. The search for amazing skin care ends here. Finally, you found it.
Paula's Choice Skincare makes products that work. No fragrance, no parabens, no fluff. Just effective, science-backed formulas that target any concern from wrinkles to breakouts.

productInformation.value: #13,474 in Beauty & Personal Care (See Top 100 in Beauty & Personal Care) #330 in Face Moisturizers

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Extremely happy with the sunscreen
reviews.reviewText: I am very picky when it comes to sunscreen on my face. I have found very few that I like this one does not burn your eyes. That is an issue that I have found with a lot of facial sunscreens. They either burn your eyes or they’re very white the lotion is an earthy neutral color maybe a very light brown in color this is a especially helpful when you don’t have very light skin cause some sunscreen can make your skin look lighter and give it a white cast. I am older and have dry skin so I kinda wish that it was a little bit more hydrating, however I don’t think it was geared for older or dryer, skins, but for sunscreen it’s excellent. I am a glow girl, so I like the fact that it gives some glow to the skin is a winner for me. I would probably repurchase, but I wanted to buy a small one just to be sure I liked it. You really need a sunscreen if you use retinol and alpha hydroxy and BHA.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Favorite moisturizer! Very thankful it’s sold on Amazon. I usually struggle with combination skin, oily in t-zone, dry and flaky elsewhere. This give me a light all over glow without looking too oily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Wheb I first applied this product, I was very disappointed because it seemed heavy and somewhat sticky. After a those time, however, my skin felt soft and moist. Will I buy it again? Maybe

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have been searching so long for a light weight moisturize and the is it. I have oily skin and this does not amplify it at all, it give a gorgeous glow under my makeup!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Looking for a new moisturizer decided to get the sample of this product. Most products don’t expire 3 months after you get it not happy about that!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality moisture size moisturizing absorption texture fair skin sensitive
reviews.reviewText: Love love loveYou have calm my nerves of getting older 47 yrs*feel clean / light*look disappearing*price I tried the trial sizeThis did not break me out or bother me in any capacity the color did not stay whiteI am fair skin so it was perfect it goes on light then melted in I was able to put on primer /makeup no bad reaction to makeupPaula’s choice genius how they put intentional ingredients together exact what you need and helps the ingredients to work togetherFigure out your skin before trying products then you will buy exactly what you’re skin craves and needsTwo kinds of sensitivity research which one you are* sensitivity issues like eczema et cetra* sensitivity to ingredientsI’m the second oneIf you are too this is perfect check out the other ones I bought at same time the toner OMG try itIf they keep the price and product level I’m a lifer:))

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Light weight with a sheen. Extra bonus sun protection. Hv been using this product for many years.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I splurged on this thinking it would be a nice addition to my skincare routine as I wasn’t wearing any on a daily basis and started retinol. This sunscreen is thick and gray, it smells like clay. Leaves my skin very sticky and shiny - some may call it dewy, I’m not into that look. I want something lightweight and feeling like it’s not there. That is not the case with this, I wouldn’t buy it again or recommend it to a friend.

I am sucker of mineral sunscreen, call it moisturizer with SPF or call it SpF with moisturizer, whatever you name it does the job beautifullyCertainly will stay my forever best lightweight SPF , like usual I have stocked this up like other Paula’s choice products I use ( it’s pandemic & out of stock is not happy feeling 😬) , this spf beautifully suits normal to dry skin and like the name suggest Defence glow, it literally adds glow which is quite visible and I totally love it ♥️Application: I apply two thin layer and it perfectly saves my skin from Sun damages and also soothes irritated skin if any !Ps : it’s only SPF 30 so it’s perfect for indoor , I wear sunscreen daily & as it’s mineral sunscreen one can safely apply around the eye & on top of lips .. it never stings or irritate skinHowever if stepping outdoor and staying longer under the sun then apply a spf 50 preferably mineral 🙌🏻
Received product well but expiring in 2/2024 when I received in Nov 2023.
It’s good for people with dry skin. Texture is good but not suitable for oily people or acne prone skin.
